newsitem.title: GERMANY: Henkel reelected head of Germany's BDI.
newsitem.headline: Henkel reelected head of Germany's BDI.

text.p: Hans-Olaf Henkel was reelected president of the German Federation of Chambers of Commerce (BDI) for another two-year term, BDI said on Monday.
Henkel, former head of IBM Deutschland GmbH, first took office on January 1, 1995.

Munich prosecutors said earlier they were no longer investigating Henkel on suspicion of assisting in tax evasion. Authorities had been looking into a bank account Henkel had opened for a friend who was barred from opening one on his own.
